title: Multiple imu sensors are called imu_sensor

content.raw:
In our control code, we load the atlas SDF files using our own parser to find the robot definition. Because there are multiple IMU sensors, we're mapping them by name. 
However in the latest version of drcsim there are three sensors called "imu_sensor". It would be nice if the names are useful (leftHandIMUSensor, rightHandIMUSensor, PelvisIMUSensor, HeadIMUSensor or something).
